21 
22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"
24 #include "TestMacros.h"
25 #include <catch.hpp>
26 #include <Eigen/Dense>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 using namespace Eigen;
31 
32 TEST_CASE("Solution of the MassBalanceSolver is converged.",
33  "[gsi]"
34 )
35 {
36  const double tol = 100*std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
37 
38  MIXTURE_GSI_MASS_LOOP
39  (
40  // Setting up
41  const size_t set_state_with_rhoi_T = 1;
42  const size_t pos_T_trans = 0;
43  size_t ns = mix.nSpecies();
44  size_t nT = mix.nEnergyEqns();
45 
46  // Conditions T = 3000K and p = 100Pa
47  VectorXd Teq = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 3000.);
48  double Peq = 100.; // Pa
49  mix.equilibrate(Teq(pos_T_trans), Peq);
50  VectorXd rhoi_s(ns);
51  mix.densities(rhoi_s.data());
52 
53  VectorXd T_s = VectorXd::Constant(nT, 300.);
54 
55  // Setting number of iterations
56  const int iter = 100;
57  mix.setIterationsSurfaceBalance(iter);
58 
59  // Mass gradient
60  VectorXd xi_e(ns);
61  xi_e = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
62  double dx = 1.;
63 
64  // Solving mass balance
65  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
66  mix.setDiffusionModel(xi_e.data(), dx);
67 
68  mix.solveSurfaceBalance();
69  mix.getSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
70 
71  // Verifying the solution gives low residual in the balance equations
72  mix.setState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
73  VectorXd xi_s(ns);
74  xi_s = Map<const VectorXd>(mix.X(), ns);
75 
76  // Compute diffusion velocities
77  VectorXd dxidx(ns);
78  dxidx = (xi_s - xi_e) / dx;
79  VectorXd vdi(ns);
80  double E = 0.;
81  mix.stefanMaxwell(dxidx.data(), vdi.data(), E);
82 
83  // Get surface production rates
84  VectorXd wdot(ns);
85  mix.setSurfaceState(rhoi_s.data(), T_s.data(), set_state_with_rhoi_T);
86  mix.surfaceReactionRates(wdot.data());
87 
88  // Blowing flux (should be zero for catalysis)
89  double mblow;
90  mix.getMassBlowingRate(mblow);
91 
92  // Building mass balance functions
93  VectorXd F(ns);
94  double rho = rhoi_s.sum();
95  F = (rhoi_s/rhoi_s.sum())*mblow + rhoi_s.cwiseProduct(vdi) - wdot;
96 
97  // Compute error
98  double err = F.lpNorm<Infinity>();
99 
100  CHECK(err == Approx(0.0).epsilon(tol));
101  )
102 }

#define MIXTURE_GSI_MASS_LOOP(__CODE__)
Loops over mixtures for Gas-Surface Interaction Mass Balance, loads each mixture and runs CODE in Cat...
